title: Amegoya Women's Boho Flowy Long Sleeve Square Neck Floral Midi Dress Smocked Spring Fall Wedding Guest Dresses
description: 👑Material: S=4-8, M=10-12, L=14-16, L=18, XL-20-22,RUN LARGE,IF IN BETWEEN SIZES WE RECOMEND SIZING DOWN.100%Polyester, super soft lightweight and not see through, smocked midi dress is easy to wear, chiffon/cotton blend maxi dresses keep you comfortable and away from the summer hot. temperature.

👑Comfy Smocked Dress: Smocked design at front and with elastic bodice design won't make you feel tight, also the loose long sleeve can hide your cute flaws and flattering.A-line style and long sleeve square neck make you more feminine and chic.

👑Perfect Vacation Dresses: Floral spring dress is made of lightweight material, makes it flowy when you walking on the beach, smocked corset and the swinging long skirt make you feel elegant for holiday vacation,or cottagecore dress for tea party.

👑Elegant Floral Dress: Floral midi dress of bohemian flower printed all-over design, and tropical print dress is vintage and never out of style.Tiered maxi dress finished with ruffle at hem add more sweet taste and make you more attractive.

👑Fashion Tips: Floral dress with sunglasses or a fashionable hat is perfectly as summer dress, when you pair it with sandals or high heels, it also will be the best outfits wear for spring, summer, fall, daily, party, holiday, homecoming, going out, dating, dinner, church, wedding, wedding guest, prom, evening.
